plugins.name: Color Nexus
plugins.description:
Color is one of the most important tools for designers. Beyond its intrinsic properties, design also requires attention to the combination, contrast, and harmony between colors.To address these needs, we created Color Nexus, To present the contrast and harmony between colors, making the analysis and adjustment process more intuitive, professional, and convenient.


ColorNexus v2.0

New Feature: Intelligent Image Color Extraction

Easily extract three sets of professional color palettes from any image! ColorNexus v2.0 utilizes multiple advanced algorithms to provide diverse color inspirations for your designs.


V2.0 Key Features:

  1. Multi-Algorithm Support: Different algorithms are used to extract color palettes, ensuring diversity and uniqueness.
  2. Quick Switching: One-click to switch between different color schemes, making the operation simple and reliable.
  3. Flexible Adjustment: Adjust the extracted colors freely according to project requirements.


Operation Steps:

1.Select an Image: Choose any image in your Figma document.

2.One-Click Extraction: Click the image icon to quickly extract a color scheme.

3.Freely Switch and Adjust: Click the image icon repeatedly to switch between the three sets of color palettes. You can also fine-tune the extracted colors according to your needs. ColorNexus provides convenient color adjustment tools.


ColorNexusV1.0

Key Features:

  1. In ColorNexus, you can adjust the hue values of a group of colors within the same color wheel, intuitively observing the angular positional relationships of each color on the wheel. This allows you to quickly identify whether they are complementary colors, analogous colors, or any other contrasting relationships.


  1. ColorNexus utilizes the HSL model, ensuring that hue, saturation, and lightness are presented in a symmetrical relationship, providing a reliable foundation for your color analysis. Simultaneously, each color's saturation and lightness are displayed on the adjustment axis, allowing you to gauge the contrast strength by their positions relative to each other—the further apart they are, the more intense the contrast. This empowers you to create a myriad of color combinations.


  1. Additionally, ColorNexus supports one-click switching between RGB and RYB modes, enabling you to view color contrasts that are more aligned with traditional art theories.


  1. Overall, ColorNexus not only helps you create a harmonious and visually pleasing set of colors but also ensures that these colors form an organic whole, rather than isolated individual elements.


Color Addition Methods:

Extract colors from Figma documents.

Input 16-digit hexadecimal color values.

Quickly add basic colors.


Color Output:

After adjustments, hover over the color block and click the download icon to export the color to the current Figma canvas.


Use Cases:

Starting from Scratch: Use ColorNexus to create a brand-new color palette.

Expanding Existing Tones: Input one or several tones and easily add more colors to complement them.

Inspiration Capture: Input beautiful color combinations into ColorNexus, which will display the relationships between colors, helping you better understand and adjust them, thereby improving your color adjustment skills.


Tips:

The RYB color wheel does not support hue adjustments because its color gamut has a nonlinear relationship with RGB, and RGB is the most accurate for adjustments on computers.

The color wheel's drag handle automatically avoids overlap when hues are close, making operation convenient.

With a clean interface that matches Figma's light and dark themes, ColorNexus runs quickly and smoothly, making it an ideal color adjustment plugin.
plugins.tagline: effortlessly combine colors

plugins.name: Hue Converter
plugins.description:
Hue converter plugin uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen and ensure consistency between the design and the in-vehicle screen colors.


You can select a single element or the entire interface, scan it, convert individual colors or all of them, and even convert the colors of the entire page.
plugins.tagline: Uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen

107922.name: Hue Converter
107922.description:
Hue converter plugin uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen and ensure consistency between the design and the in-vehicle screen colors.


You can select a single element or the entire interface, scan it, convert individual colors or all of them, and even convert the colors of the entire page.
107922.tagline: Uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen

plugins.name: Gridder
plugins.description:
A simple tool to generate grids and/or sort layers in ascending or descending layer name order.


How to use


Sorting: Select a group of layers, then select the sort direction.

Gridding: Select a group of layers, then select either the column count or row count. Then adjust the spacing values.


Combine the two use for rapid organized grid creation and maintenance.


From yours truly,

Ryan Nono
plugins.tagline: A simple tool to generate grids and/or sort layers in ascending or descending layer name order.

104536.name: Gridder
104536.description:

Gridding: Select a group of layers, then select either the column count or row count. Then adjust the spacing values.

From yours truly,

Ryan Nono
104536.tagline: A simple tool to generate grids and/or sort layers in ascending or descending layer name order.

plugins.name: Kittl Templates
plugins.description:
Design should feel fluid. Fast. Inspiring. Not like you're wrestling with ten panels just to move some text around.


That’s why Kittl exists—to give you powerful design tools that feel intuitive yet still deliver professional results.


If you’ve worked with design software before, you’ll find Kittl refreshingly familiar—but way less rigid. This guide will walk you through the essentials, from setting up your first project to using advanced features like text transformations, vector exports, and built-in AI tools.


From personal projects to commercial work, Kittl gives you the flexibility and control to bring your ideas to life—without the friction.

accepted.name: Pawel
accepted.description: Product Designer, playing with JS. Figma plugin for generating NFTs.

plugins.tagline: Explore over 1,000 graphic design templates to spark your creativity

plugins.name: Universal Design (beta)
plugins.description:
UDML Exporter for Figma (beta)


Transform your Figma designs into AI-ready UDML (Universal Design Markup Language) documents. UDML Exporter creates structured, semantic descriptions of your designs specifically optimized for AI interpretation and code generation.


AI-First Design Documentation


UDML is built from the ground up to be understood by AI. Instead of trying to directly convert designs to code (which often produces messy, unmaintainable results), UDML provides AI agents with:


  1. Semantic Structure: Clear representation of layout hierarchies and relationships
  2. Design Context: Comprehensive documentation of components and their usage
  3. Style System: Organized design tokens and variables
  4. Asset Catalog: Structured references to exported graphics and icons
  5. Rich Metadata: Layer names, descriptions, and relationships that AI can interpret


Why AI + UDML?


Traditional Figma-to-code tools try to guess what components you meant to create. UDML takes a different approach:


  1. Let AI Do the Heavy Lifting: Instead of making assumptions, provide AI with rich context
  2. Semantic Understanding: AI can interpret layer names and relationships to generate appropriate components
  3. Design System Integration: AI can map your design tokens to existing system variables
  4. Framework Flexibility: Generate code for any framework or library
  5. Open and Extensible: No locked-in formats or proprietary solutions


How It Works


  1. Design in Figma using Auto Layout and components
  2. Export to UDML (optimized for AI consumption)
  3. Provide the UDML to an AI agent (like Claude or Cursor)
  4. Get clean, semantic code that matches your design system


Example AI Interpretation


<!-- UDML Export -->
<column name="user-profile-card" gap="16px">
<image name="avatar" src="assets/user-avatar.png"/>
<text name="user-name" typography="heading-medium">John Doe</text>
<text name="user-title" typography="body-regular">Senior Designer</text>
</column>


AI might interpret this as:


<!-- React Interpretation -->
<UserCard>
<Avatar src={user.avatar} />
<Heading level={3}>{user.name}</Heading>
<Text>{user.title}</Text>
</UserCard>


Perfect For


  1. Designers who want AI to understand their work
  2. Developers who need intelligent code generation
  3. Teams building or maintaining design systems
  4. Anyone looking for an alternative to traditional Figma-to-code tools


Getting Started


  1. Install the plugin
  2. Design with AI interpretation in mind
  3. Export to UDML
  4. Let AI generate your code


Design for AI


To get the best results:

  1. Use clear, descriptive layer names
  2. Leverage Auto Layout for clear structure
  3. Create consistent component patterns
  4. Document your design system tokens


Join the AI-First Design Movement


UDML is an open specification for AI-friendly design documentation. Help shape the future of AI-assisted design-to-code workflows.


docs.universaldesign.ai
plugins.tagline: Figma to code, your way

example-
name|@buttons|@icons

Item2|style:secondary|type:heart

plugins.name: Quick Section
plugins.description:
Features

  1. Create sections without manually changing colors each time.
  2. Add headers to organize your frames horizontally or vertically.
  3. Access features through the UI or quick menu actions.
  4. Set up keyboard shortcuts to perform quick menu actions faster.


How it works

  1. Select the layers you want to organize.
  2. Click an option from the UI or run it from the plugin menu.
  3. Sections and headers are created and aligned to your selections.


Alternatively, you can add sections or headers directly on the canvas without selecting any layers.
plugins.tagline: Create sections and e

plugins.name: Renamer
plugins.description:
Renamer for Figma


Plugin for finding and replacing text in layer and variable names, with automatic naming convention conversion.


Features


  1. Layer renaming: Quickly find and replace text in layer names
  2. Layer type filtering: frames, text, components, images, etc.
  3. Variable support: find and replace in variable names
  4. Flexible filtering options for variables: search by full name, path only, or name only
  5. Auto-renaming: Convert layer names to different naming conventions automatically
  6. Naming conventions: Support for camelCase, PascalCase, snake_case, kebab-case, flatcase, dotcase, and spacecase
  7. Live preview: See how names will look before applying changes
  8. Revert functionality: Restore original names after renaming
  9. Dot case support: Special support for CSS class-style naming with leading dots (.class-name)


How to use


For layers:


1. Select the "Layers" tab

2. Choose the layer types to search

3. Enter text to find

4. Enter text to replace

5. Enable/disable case sensitivity

6. Click "Rename"

7. If needed, click "Revert" to restore original names


Auto-renaming:


1. Select the "Auto" tab

2. Choose the layer types to rename

3. Select the desired naming convention (camelCase, PascalCase, etc.)

4. See the live preview of how names will be converted

5. Click "Rename" to apply the changes

6. If needed, click "Revert" to restore original names


For variables:


1. Select the "Variables" tab

2. Choose the search filter:

- All - search the entire variable name

- Path - search only in the path (all parts before the last "/")

- Name - search only in the name (part after the last "/")

3. Enter text to find

4. Enter text to replace

5. Enable/disable case sensitivity

6. Click "Rename"


Troubleshooting


If the plugin cannot find variables:

1. Make sure there are variables in the file

2. Check that variables are available on the current page

3. Try restarting the plugin

4. Ensure that your Figma version supports variables


If auto-renaming doesn't work as expected:

1. Note that auto-renaming currently works only for layers, not for variables

2. Make sure you've selected the correct layer types to rename

3. If you need to undo changes, use the "Revert" button


👉🏻 LinkedIn

👉🏻 Behance

👉🏻 Dribbble

✉️ Mail me

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Quickly rename layers and variables with precision and ease!

Maskily🎭📄


🚀 Enhance your Figma workflow with powerful masking tools and seamless JSON export! Whether you're a designer or developer, Maskily Exporter helps you create precise masks while effortlessly exporting structured JSON data from your designs.


✨ Key Features:

✅ Smart Masking – Apply, modify, and manage masks with ease.

✅ JSON Export – Extract structured design data for frontend integration.

✅ Intuitive UI – Simple, fast, and efficient masking & export process.

✅ Optimized for Devs & Designers – Perfect for UI/UX workflows and handoff.


💡 Perfect for:

UI/UX Designers – Create polished, masked visuals effortlessly.

Developers – Export structured design data in JSON for seamless integration.

Creative Teams – Speed up workflow with powerful masking & data extraction.


🔥 Start using MaskPro Exporter today and take your Figma workflow to the next level!

plugins.name: MultiSelect Plus
plugins.description:
MultiSelect Plus helps you select multiple layers faster and easier than ever before.


Key Features:

• Select multiple layers as search criteria

• Find matching layers across your entire document

• Support for all layer types including shapes, components, and text


Perfect for designers working with:

• Repetitive element structures

• Batch updates and modifications

• Design file cleanup and organization


How to Use:

1. Select any layer on your canvas

2. Add more Layers to use it as your search criteria

3. Click "Find & Select" to highlight all matching layers

4. Use the history panel to quickly reuse


Boost your workflow efficiency by selecting exactly what you need in seconds!
plugins.tagline: Do something that goes beyond "selecting matching layers”

plugins.name: Frame Presets
plugins.description:
This free plugin allows the user to create frames with a specified name, width, and height in the 'Create New Preset' tab. The user can then scroll through their presets in the 'View & Alter Presets' tab or use the search bar for their convenience. Additionally, in the 'View & Alter Presets' tab by clicking on the preset's name the user will be able to confirm the preset's information and apply that frame within their Figma file. Each preset also provides the user with the option to edit its parameters or delete it from local memory.


https://www.buymeacoffee.com/cuddlybeast
plugins.tagline: Create, delete, edit, and apply your own custom frame presets.

Additionally, in the 'View & Alter Presets' tab by clicking on the preset's name the user will be able to confirm the preset's information and apply that frame within their Figma file. Each preset also provides the user with the option to edit its parameters or delete it from local memory.


https://www.buymeacoffee.com/cuddlybeast
113208.tagline: Create, delete, edit, and apply your own custom frame presets.

plugins.name: Apply modes to all pages
plugins.description:
This plugin works by replicating the current page selected variable modes to every other page of the document.


Instructions

  1. Set the desired modes in the current page.
  2. While in the page, run the plugin.
  3. Check the other pages to see if the modes were applied correctly.


Useful information:

  1. The plugin will replace modes within the same collection.
  2. The plugin will not remove modes. If a page has an additional collection that is not in the current page, it will keep it.
  3. For large files, it might take a little while for the plugin to finish running, wait for a message saying ”✨ All done! ✨”. It might also take a while for the file to finish uploading.
plugins.tagline: Replicate Current Page Mode in all pages of the document

104411.name: Apply modes to all pages
104411.description:

Useful information:

  1. The plugin will replace modes within the same collection.
  2. The plugin will not remove modes. If a page has an additional collection that is not in the current page, it will keep it.
  3. For large files, it might take a little while for the plugin to finish running, wait for a message saying ”✨ All done! ✨”. It might also take a while for the file to finish uploading.
104411.tagline: Replicate Current Page Mode in all pages of the document

plugins.name: HCT Variablinator
plugins.description:
HCT Variablinator generates a color palette following Google's HCT color theory. It can then create a Figma Variables collection with all the tones created. You can then reference these through Aliases in your other collections.


It can also generate swatches directly into your Figma documents based on your Figma Variables collection with contrast/WCAG information.


Future features:

  1. Code gen for theming using style-dictionary for plug and play
  2. Gitlab/Github integration support
plugins.tagline: Variablinate your HCT scales for brands and themes

138924.name: HCT Variablinator
138924.description:
HCT Variablinator generates a color palette following Google's HCT color theory. It can then create a Figma Variables collection with all the tones created. You can then reference these through Aliases in your other collections.


It can also generate swatches directly into your Figma documents based on your Figma Variables collection with contrast/WCAG information.


Future features:

  1. Code gen for theming using style-dictionary for plug and play
  2. Gitlab/Github integration support
138924.release_notes:
1. Major UI overhaul - updated to a Vite app with shadcn components
2. Added a lightness scale to each color
    a. Able to select the number of stops for each individual color
    b. Able to select the scale for each individual color
3. Added UI updates for displaying contrast values for the different steps in each color.
4. Added the ability to create swatches for your Figma Variables in your Figma document

Coming soon:
1. Gitlab/Github integrations - allowing the storage of token information in Github or Gitlab repositories.
2. JSON download of Figma Variables for use outside of Figma.
138924.tagline: Variablinate your HCT scales for brands and themes

plugins.name: GIFtastic
plugins.description:
🎬 GIFtastic - Turn Your Figma Frames Into Animated GIFs

Transform your Figma designs into captivating animated GIFs with just a few clicks! Perfect for showcasing UI interactions, creating marketing assets, or sharing design concepts.


✨ Key Features

  1. Smart & Simple
  2. Select frames and preview your animation in real-time
  3. Drag & drop to reorder frames
  4. One-click export with automatic downloads


Professional Quality

  1. 4 quality levels (64-256 colours)
  2. Multiple background options (transparent, white, black, or frame fill)
  3. Advanced dithering for smooth gradients
  4. Real-time file size preview


Complete Control

  1. Adjustable frame timing (0.05-5 seconds)
  2. Loop settings and playback controls
  3. Live preview with play/pause
  4. Memory-efficient processing


🚀 Perfect For

  1. UI/UX Designers: Showcase app interactions and user flows
  2. Marketing Teams: Create engaging social media content
  3. Product Teams: Demonstrate features and functionality
  4. Anyone: Who wants to make their designs move!


🎯 How It Works

  1. Select your frames in Figma
  2. Preview your animation with real-time playback
  3. Adjust quality, timing, and background settings
  4. Reorder frames by dragging if needed
  5. Export and download your GIF instantly


Ready to bring your designs to life? Install GIFtastic and start creating engaging animated stories from your Figma frames!
plugins.tagline: Transform your Figma designs into captivating animated GIFs with just a few clicks!

plugins.name: Pigment Pilot
plugins.description:
Pigment Pilot is your all-in-one color inspiration companion for Figma. Extract beautiful color palettes from any image, explore millions of curated photos from Unsplash (Soon from Pinterest), and manage your color schemes effortlessly. Perfect for designers who want to create harmonious color combinations from visual inspiration.


🎺 With the new apply feature, see how an extracted color palette would look in real life by applying it on any SVG type image (illustrations, logos etc)


Key Features

🎨 Extract 8-color palettes from any image

🔍 Search and import Unsplash photos directly

💾 Save and organize your favorite palettes

🎯 Create Figma Color Styles instantly

🎭 Generate CSS variables for development

👕 See how your extracted colors would look when used in real designs with "Apply" feature.


Whether you're designing a website, creating a brand identity, or looking for fresh color inspiration, Pigment Pilot helps you build professional color schemes in seconds. Simply select an image, click extract, and watch as it generates a perfectly balanced palette ready for your next design.
plugins.tagline: Pick, Click, Color Magic.

130377.name: Pigment Pilot
130377.description:
Pigment Pilot is your all-in-one color inspiration companion for Figma. Extract beautiful color palettes from any image, explore millions of curated photos from Unsplash (Soon from Pinterest), and manage your color schemes effortlessly. Perfect for designers who want to create harmonious color combinations from visual inspiration.


🎺 With the new apply feature, see how an extracted color palette would look in real life by applying it on any SVG type image (illustrations, logos etc)


Key Features

🎨 Extract 8-color palettes from any image

🔍 Search and import Unsplash photos directly

💾 Save and organize your favorite palettes

🎯 Create Figma Color Styles instantly

🎭 Generate CSS variables for development

👕 See how your extracted colors would look when used in real designs with "Apply" feature.


Whether you're designing a website, creating a brand identity, or looking for fresh color inspiration, Pigment Pilot helps you build professional color schemes in seconds. Simply select an image, click extract, and watch as it generates a perfectly balanced palette ready for your next design.
130377.release_notes:
🎺 The Brand New Apply Tab 🎺

Transform your illustrations with saved color palettes in just a few steps:

1. Select Your Illustration  – Select any frame containing your SVG illustration (Works best with vector illustrations using solid colors) 
2. Choose a Palette – Navigate to the "Apply" tab -> Browse through your saved color palettes -> Click on a palette card to select it.
3. Generate Preview – Click "Generate Assets" to see a preview and you'll get:
[ Original illustration (left) : Transformed illustration (right) ] alongwith a color mapping legend showing the color transformations
4. Review and Iterate – Compare the original and transformed versions side by side, Check the color mapping legend to see how colors were mapped. Try different palettes until you find the perfect match

💡 Pro Tips:
The plugin intelligently maps colors while maintaining visual hierarchy
More vibrant palettes will result in more striking transformations
Works with any number of colors in your illustration
Perfect for creating theme variations of your illustrations

Note: The transformed illustration is created as a new frame, keeping your original artwork untouched.

plugins.name: Ungroup with BG
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to ungroup frames while preserving their background colors, corner radius, and strokes. When you ungroup a frame that has background styles, the plugin automatically creates a rectangle with the same styles at the same layer position.


Features:

• Preserves background colors and opacity

• Maintains corner radius settings

• Keeps stroke styles

• Retains the original layer position

• Automatically selects the new background and ungrouped elements


背景色やストロークが設定されたフレームをグループ解除する際に、それらのスタイルを保持するプラグインです。背景スタイルを持つフレームをグループ解除すると、自動的に同じスタイルの四角形が同じレイヤー位置に作成されます。


機能：

• 背景色と不透明度を保持

• 角丸の設定を維持

• ストロークスタイルを保持

• 元のレイヤー位置を維持

• 新しい背景と解除された要素を自動選択
plugins.tagline: Ungroup frames while preserving their background styles

125619.description:

plugins.name: Rename Code Syntax (Web/iOS/Android)
plugins.description:
Convert Figma variables to developer-ready code syntax in one click!


Features


🚀 Platform-specific outputs:


  1. Web: var(--color-primary) (CSS)
  2. iOS: colorPrimary (Swift)
  3. Android: color_primary (Kotlin/XML)


🔧 Customization:


  1. Add prefixes like color- or btn-
  2. Choose word dividers (-, _, or custom)
  3. Override default formats (kebab/camel/snake case)


🛠️ Smart formatting:


  1. Handles spaces and special characters (e.g., /)
  2. Works across variable collections
  3. Dark/light mode support


Why developers and designers love it:


  1. Saves hours of manual renaming
  2. Ensures naming consistency across platforms
  3. Perfect for design system maintenance


Usage Instructions


1- Select a variable collection

2- Choose your target platform (Web/iOS/Android)

3- Customize formatting (optional):

  1. Prefix: Add a prefix like color-
  2. Divider: Replace spaces// with -, _, etc.
  3. Format: Override default platform formats

4- Click "Update Variables" – done!


Support & Feedback

"Found a bug? Have feature requests? Reach out at gmazzo@gmail.com


Privacy Notes

"This plugin does NOT collect user data or connect to external servers."
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma variables to developer-ready code syntax in one click!

plugins.name: Color Palette Generator
plugins.description:
🎨 Color Palette Generator – Your Ultimate Color Companion for Figma


Effortlessly create stunning and harmonious color palettes with the enhanced Color Palette Generator. Whether you’re designing for web, mobile, or branding, this plugin offers everything you need from simple color schemes to complex, accessible palettes.


💡 Key Features:


🎯 Palette Generation:

  1. Generate palettes by keyword, random, triadic, analogous, complementary, split-complementary, tetradic, or warm soothing pastels.
  2. Explore color harmony with an interactive color wheel and adjustable saturation/lightness sliders.
  3. Extract colors from images with customizable settings for color count, threshold, and brightness.


⚡ Palette Management:

  1. Apply palettes directly to Figma layers.
  2. Save, load, and delete palettes for future use.


🧑‍💻 Accessibility & Simulation:

  1. Accessibility Check for WCAG contrast compliance.
  2. Color Blindness Simulation (Protanopia, Deuteranopia, Tritanopia) for inclusive design.


🌟 Enhanced UI Experience:

  1. Tabs for basic, pro and image features.
  2. Dark Mode support for seamless design workflows.
  3. User Notifications for real-time feedback.


💥 Design smarter, faster, and more inclusively directly in Figma.


Enhance your design process and craft stunning color combinations with the Color Palette Generator plugin!
plugins.tagline: Effortless color harmony for your designs—generate, apply, and export palettes in one click!

plugins.name: Figma To Rust
plugins.description:
Figma To Rust Plugin Export

Streamline your design-to-development workflow with the Figma To Rust Plugin Export. This powerful plugin bridges the gap between your creative designs in Figma and the robust interface code needed for Rust plugins.


Features:

  1. Seamless Export: Easily export your Figma sketches directly into interface code tailored for Rust plugins.
  2. Time-Saving: Reduce the manual effort required to translate designs into code, allowing you to focus more on creativity and functionality.
  3. Consistent Design: Ensure that your Rust plugin interfaces maintain the same visual fidelity as your original Figma designs.
  4. Easy Integration: Integrate the exported code effortlessly into your existing Rust projects, making it a breeze to update and iterate on your designs.


How It Works:

  1. Design in Figma: Create your interface designs using Figma's intuitive tools.
  2. Export with Plugin: Use the Figma To Rust Plugin Export to convert your designs into Rust-compatible interface code.
  3. Implement in Rust: Import the generated code into your Rust project and start building your plugin with a solid visual foundation.


Ideal For:

  1. Developers looking to accelerate the development process for Rust plugins.
  2. Designers who want to ensure their designs are accurately represented in the final product.
  3. Teams seeking to improve collaboration between design and development phases.


Experience the efficiency and accuracy of the Figma To Rust Plugin Export today and elevate your plugin development process to new heights!
plugins.tagline: Allows you to export your sketches from Figma to interface code for Rust plugins

122807.name: Figma To Rust
122807.description:
Figma To Rust Plugin Export

Streamline your design-to-development workflow with the Figma To Rust Plugin Export. This powerful plugin bridges the gap between your creative designs in Figma and the robust interface code needed for Rust plugins.


Features:

  1. Seamless Export: Easily export your Figma sketches directly into interface code tailored for Rust plugins.
  2. Time-Saving: Reduce the manual effort required to translate designs into code, allowing you to focus more on creativity and functionality.
  3. Consistent Design: Ensure that your Rust plugin interfaces maintain the same visual fidelity as your original Figma designs.
  4. Easy Integration: Integrate the exported code effortlessly into your existing Rust projects, making it a breeze to update and iterate on your designs.


How It Works:

  1. Design in Figma: Create your interface designs using Figma's intuitive tools.
  2. Export with Plugin: Use the Figma To Rust Plugin Export to convert your designs into Rust-compatible interface code.
  3. Implement in Rust: Import the generated code into your Rust project and start building your plugin with a solid visual foundation.


Ideal For:

  1. Developers looking to accelerate the development process for Rust plugins.
  2. Designers who want to ensure their designs are accurately represented in the final product.
  3. Teams seeking to improve collaboration between design and development phases.


Experience the efficiency and accuracy of the Figma To Rust Plugin Export today and elevate your plugin development process to new heights!
122807.tagline: Allows you to export your sketches from Figma to interface code for Rust plugins

plugins.name: Frame
plugins.description:
"Frame" is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your workflow by providing intuitive tools for repositioning and resizing objects within their parent frames.


Buy me coffee


Simply select the object you wish to reposition or resize, and then choose from a variety of predefined options in the "Frame" plugin panel. Whether you're aligning objects to the left, center, or right, or resizing them to occupy a specific portion of their parent frame, "Frame" makes the process quick and effortless.

accepted.name: Sunny
accepted.description: Solving some of the use cases my team encounters when working in Figma.

plugins.tagline: Resize and re-position objects quickly

plugins.name: Sloth D2C 设计稿转代码
plugins.description:
Sloth D2C 设计稿转代码插件是一款面向前端开发和设计团队的智能化工具，支持将设计稿快速转化为可直接用于生产的HTML代码。也支持输入文本&图片等信息通过AI一键生成设计稿。

1、高质量还原：通过该插件对设计稿生成的代码，在样式布局上能够高度还原设计稿，减少了人工编码的工时，省去设计走查流程。

2、更贴近人工代码：生成的代码支持tailwindcss、autolayout/flex布局、合理的行列分组，循环节点提取，图床托管等功能。

3、人工编辑：生成的代码不够满意，支持在线人工二次编辑，如图片节点的重新编解组、源码修改、属性调整等。

4、 一键生成设计稿：根据输入文本&图片等信息，结合prompt工程，AI生成指定风格页面代码后，再进一步转换成figma节点。
plugins.tagline: D2C-设计稿转码，A2D（AI生稿）

1、高质量还原：通过该插件对设计稿生成的代码，在样式布局上能够高度还原设计稿，减少了人工编码的工时，省去设计走查流程。

2、更贴近人工代码：生成的代码支持tailwindcss、autolayout/flex布局、合理的行列分组，循环节点提取，图床托管等功能。

3、人工编辑：生成的代码不够满意，支持在线人工二次编辑，如图片节点的重新编解组、源码修改、属性调整等。

本次版本主要对设计稿进行针对性还原
1. 父子关系优化
2. 文字样式优化
3. 转换性能优化

plugins.name: ArcTouch Flutter Theme Generator
plugins.description:
Generate Text Styles

Automatically creates a TextStyleTheme class based on all text styles in your Figma project. This class extends ThemeExtension, allowing seamless integration into your Flutter theme.


Generate Theme

Generates a ColorTheme for each variable collection in your project. Each collection is converted into a ThemeExtension to be used within your Flutter theme. If multiple collections lead to class name conflicts, you can easily rename them in your project.


Generate Color Styles

Creates a const class containing color definitions. This is ideal for projects without design tokens or those that don’t require color variations, providing simple, static color constants.


Generate Design Tokens

Creates const classes for design tokens such as spacings, paddings, and borders.



----------


Meet ArcTouch

ArcTouch creates lovable apps, websites, and connected experiences. Our Flutter development team helps companies design and develop successful cross-platform applications.


Contact us to learn how Flutter can accelerate your product roadmap and maximize your ROI.

accepted.name: ArcTouch
accepted.description:
ArcTouch creates lovable apps, websites, and connected experiences for companies of all sizes.
Learn more at arctouch.com.

plugins.tagline: Generate Flutter ThemeExtension Classes from Figma Variables and Text Styles

plugins.name: Design Critter 🐛 – Feedback Makes You Better
plugins.description:
AI Feedback on your designs for websites, web apps, mobile apps, emails and more.


How it works:

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Select a frame, group or layer you want feedback on
  3. Open the plugin
  4. Select the area of design you want feedback on
  5. Recommended: Add any supporting context on what you're designing, what the user goals are, or specific element you want feedback on
  6. Click Get Feedback
  7. Copy any of the feedback and paste it next in your file so you don't lose it


Most importantly if you have any feedback for us, please email kovacjeremy@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Instant AI feedback on your designs helping you improve UX, UI, content and more.

plugins.name: Any Variables Import (变量导入)
plugins.description:
You don't need to prepare or clean the variables from unnecessary symbols; simply copy the code as it is, and the plugin will automatically find and import all the variables


Key Features:

• Universal Import: Supports colors, numbers, strings, and booleans

• Flexible Collections: Create new variable sets or update existing ones

• Includes support for variable modes

• Wide Compatibility: Works with CSS, LESS, and SASS syntax

• Comprehensive Color Format Support:

Standard formats: HEX, RGB/RGBA, HSL/HSLA, HSB/HSBA

Modern formats: HWB, LCH, LAB, Display-P3

• Intuitive Interface: Includes clear examples for all variable types

• Real-Time Feedback: Visual progress tracking and detailed import summary

• Supports Chinese and Spanish languages.


Note: Currently, the plugin copies values from referenced variables rather than creating actual variable references in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Easily import CSS, LESS, SASS variables into Figma—colors, numbers, strings, and booleans.

127318.name: Any Variables Import (变量导入)
127318.description:
You don't need to prepare or clean the variables from unnecessary symbols; simply copy the code as it is, and the plugin will automatically find and import all the variables


Key Features:

• Universal Import: Supports colors, numbers, strings, and booleans

• Flexible Collections: Create new variable sets or update existing ones

• Includes support for variable modes

• Wide Compatibility: Works with CSS, LESS, and SASS syntax

• Comprehensive Color Format Support:

Standard formats: HEX, RGB/RGBA, HSL/HSLA, HSB/HSBA

Modern formats: HWB, LCH, LAB, Display-P3

• Intuitive Interface: Includes clear examples for all variable types

• Real-Time Feedback: Visual progress tracking and detailed import summary

• Supports Chinese and Spanish languages.


Note: Currently, the plugin copies values from referenced variables rather than creating actual variable references in Figma.
127318.release_notes: Fixed issues with non-existent variable modes, improved paste handling with various delimiters (spaces, line breaks), and added support for nested variable references.
127318.tagline: Easily import CSS, LESS, SASS variables into Figma—colors, numbers, strings, and booleans.

plugins.name: Apply variable modes to all pages
plugins.description:
Apply your current page variable modes to all pages of your file!

Perfect for designers and teams working with design tokens, themes, or variable-based workflows.


How to use

1 - Go to a page (or create one) that has the desired variable modes applied

2 - Click "Apply this to all pages" / "Remove modes from all pages"


Done! You have easily copied the variable modes applied to your current page and apply them to all pages in your file with a single click.
plugins.tagline: Apply your current page variable modes to all pages of your file!
